translation.en: -Well, I don't think that's very-- -Just go!
This is higher than I thought.
Hey. Do you have plans this weekend? My parents are gonna be out of town.
translation.it: Hai programmi per il weekend? I miei saranno fuori città.

translation.en: I was thinking about having a party or something.
-Let's start with-- -[boy] Do you mean physically?
Or is "everything" encompassed by both things? Are you feeling overwhelmed by anything?
translation.it: - O sono "le cose" a racchiudere entrambi? - Ti senti sopraffatto?

translation.en: If "everything" is encompassed by both things,
are they a part of our reality, or are they somewhere else?
translation.it: sarebbero parte della nostra realtà o no?

translation.en: I need you to take these meetings seriously.
OK, do you "get" that you're on probation,
translation.it: Ma hai capito che sei sotto osservazione

translation.en: and in danger of not graduating?
You've already missed two weeks of school this year.
translation.it: Hai già perso due settimane, quest'anno.

translation.en: I just wanna clarify real quickly.
Is this the grandma who's died four times over the past three years?
translation.it: È la nonna che è morta 4 volte negli ultimi 3 anni?

translation.en: I really wanna help you, but you've gotta take this seriously.
translation.it: Voglio davvero aiutarti, ma devi prenderla seriamente.

translation.en: I mean, you agreed to these terms, these weekly counseling sessions,
translation.it: Hai accettato tu le condizioni: questi incontri settimanali,
una buona media e attività extracurriculari.

translation.en: If I screw anything up, I'm out.
We're not askin' a lot of you, Finch.
You just need to show up.
[girl] My parents are pissed because I missed early admissions, but it's not like that matters, anyway.
translation.it: I miei sono incazzati perché ho saltato le pre-ammissioni,

translation.en: I mean, I know I'm gonna get in.
translation.it: ma tanto so che mi prenderanno.

translation.en: So, you going to Amanda's party?
translation.it: Allora... vai alla festa di Amanda?

translation.en: It couldn't hurt to have a little fun, right?
Yo, do you think it'd be weird if I named my kid after a famous person?
translation.it: Sarebbe strano se chiamassi mio figlio come una persona famosa?

translation.en: Like, if I named him Danny DeVito Donahue,
translation.it: Tipo, se lo chiamassi "Danny DeVito Donahue",

translation.en: do you... do you think he'd be mad about it?
Follow-up question: how high are you right now?
On the scale, I'd probably say very... this way.
translation.it: Su una scala, direi probabilmente da questa parte.

translation.en: Just admiring the social norms of teenage angst.
translation.it: Ammiro le norme sociali dell'angoscia adolescenziale.

translation.en: Why ask about her all of a sudden?
I'm intrigued. A guy can't be intrigued?
translation.it: - Sono intrigato. Non si può? - Certo che sì.

translation.en: Well, a guy can be intrigued. You being intrigued is weird.
translation.it: - Sono intrigato. Non si può? - Certo che sì. Ma è strano per te.

translation.en: -[boy] Definitely weird. -No, I don't think it's weird.
translation.it: - Molto strano. - No, non penso sia strano.

translation.en: Wait, if you don't think you're weird, well...
translation.it: Se non pensi di essere strano...

translation.en: -Yeah, that's true. Very true. -[boy] She has a point.
translation.it: - Sì, quello è vero. - Ha ragione.
- Ha chiamato il consulente scolastico. - Embrione?

translation.en: His name's Embry. I call him Embryo. It's the little things, Kate.
translation.it: Si chiama Embry. Lo chiamo Embrione. Sono le piccole cose, Kate.

translation.en: Did you do something I should be worried about?
I'm genuinely offended by that supposition.
It's fine. I'll deal with it.
-[Kate] I hate when you say that. -Why?
Because what you really mean is that I'm gonna have to deal with it.
translation.it: Perché significa che dovrò farlo io.

translation.en: Did you cut class again? No! For fuck's sake,
translation.it: - Hai saltato la scuola? - No! Porca puttana,

translation.en: just go hang out with Tina or whatever it is you do.
translation.it: esci con Tina, fai quello che ti pare.

translation.en: OK. I'm gonna be home late. There's food in the fridge.
translation.it: D'accordo. Torno tardi. C'è del cibo in frigo.

translation.en: She had to go to Chicago for business. Remember?

translation.it: Ah, sì, giusto. - Ti voglio bene. - Ehi.
- Ti voglio bene. - Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: [Dad] Your mother and I know that today couldn't have been easy.
translation.it: Io e tua madre sappiamo che oggi non è stato facile.

translation.en: And it wasn't easy for us either.
translation.it: Non lo è stato nemmeno per noi.

translation.en: -If you need to talk about it-- -[door opens]
[Mom] I thought this would be nice.
I've been making it for 19 years.
[teacher] As some of you will be graduating and leaving us at the end of the year,
translation.it: Visto che a fine anno alcuni di voi si diplomeranno,

translation.en: I feel an obligation to make sure you see the wondrous sights of Indiana
translation.it: voglio assicurarmi che vediate i più bei scorci dell'Indiana

translation.en: To wander them, if you will.
translation.it: Che andiate in esplorazione, se vogliamo.

translation.en: For your class project, you must report on two or more wonders of Indiana.
translation.it: Come progetto, dovrete scrivere di due o più meraviglie dell'Indiana.

translation.en: explain their significance to you and to Indiana,
translation.it: spiegherete cosa significano per voi e per l'Indiana

translation.en: and why you chose to visit them.
I want you to take time on this assignment.
translation.it: Voglio che vi prendiate del tempo.

translation.en: -What? -[teacher] All right, settle. Violet, are you OK?
translation.it: - Che c'è? - Calmatevi. Violet, stai bene?

translation.en: All right, let's take our seats. Let's focus up.
Yes, I am done, and can I just say you are doing a fine job teaching this class.
translation.it: Sì, e vorrei dire che sta facendo un ottimo lavoro di insegnamento.

translation.en: My young brain is plump with knowledge.
translation.it: Il mio cervello è gonfio di sapere.

translation.en: you'll be taking photos, doing some drawings, capturing detail.
translation.it: Come dicevo, farete fotografie, disegni, vi appunterete i dettagli.

translation.en: You will be doing this in teams of two.
do you think that there's such a thing as a perfect day?
translation.it: Credi che esista un giorno perfetto?

translation.en: I'm the last person you should be asking.
translation.it: Sono l'ultima persona a cui dovresti chiederlo.

translation.en: this teacher wants us to do this project with a partner,
translation.it: l'insegnante vuole farci lavorare in coppia a un progetto,

translation.en: and I just don't wanna do it.
translation.it: ma a me non va di farlo.

translation.en: Well, did you ask for an alternate project?
translation.it: Beh... Hai chiesto un progetto alternativo?

translation.en: Yeah, he just... he wouldn't listen.
Well, maybe it's time to get back out there.
translation.it: Forse è ora di rimettersi in gioco.

translation.en: That's the same thing he said.
-But you just don't go out anymore. -That's not true.
translation.it: - Ma non esci più. - Non è vero.

translation.en: When's the last time you hung out with your friends?
translation.it: Da quant'è che non vedi i tuoi amici?

translation.en: I think it would be really good if you'd spend some time with them.
translation.it: Ti farebbe bene passare un po' di tempo con loro.

translation.en: So, if I hung out with my friends, you'd get me outta this assignment?
translation.it: Se esco coi miei amici, mi fai cambiare il progetto?

translation.en: -I'm gonna get a drink. Do you want one? -I'm good.
translation.it: - Prendo da bere. Ne vuoi? - No, grazie.

translation.en: You know me. I love to rage.
[chuckles] So, you wanna go out back? Talk a little?
translation.it: Usciamo un po' fuori? A parlare?

translation.en: I think I'm gonna leave pretty soon, actually.
translation.it: In realtà, penso di andare via a breve.

translation.en: Really? But... I mean, I just got here.
It's just all a little much, you know?
translation.it: È tutto un po' troppo, capisci?

translation.en: How much longer are you gonna act like this?
It's been months. When are you gonna just...
translation.it: Sono passati mesi. Quando pensi di...

translation.en: Violet, you know I didn't mean it like that. Just...
translation.it: Violet, lo sai che non intendevo...

translation.en: [Finch] Violet Markey, if you're seeing this, you're still alive.
translation.it: Violet Markey, se stai guardando questo video, significa che sei viva.

translation.en: [singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.it: Ti ho incontrata in piedi sul parapetto

translation.en: ♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.it: Cosa ti frulla dentro quel bel cranietto?

translation.en: ♪ I met you standing on a ledge ♪
translation.it: Ti ho incontrata in piedi sul parapetto

translation.en: ♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.it: Piuttosto vieni a parlare con me Ti aspetto

translation.en: The video will self-destruct in three, two...
translation.it: Il video si autodistruggerà tra tre, due...

translation.en: I wanna talk about the bridge.
[Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.it: "Non possiamo affrontare un altro di quei terribili momenti."

translation.en: One morning barely qualifies as a terrible time.
translation.it: Una mattina non mi pare un "terribile momento".

translation.en: the website that you have with your sister?
translation.it: Il sito che hai con tua sorella?

translation.en: I read some of your stuff. It's really good.
So, you moved here from California.
translation.it: Ti sei trasferita qui dalla California.

translation.en: I didn't know that it happened there.
Whatever you are, I saved your life.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa tu abbia, ti ho salvato la vita.

translation.en: You're making a big deal out of nothing.
translation.it: Stai facendo una tragedia per niente.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
I was just thinkin' that we should be partners.
I think it would be good for you to get out.
Maybe I don't wanna get out.
But the tiniest few might actually mean well.
translation.it: Ma... una piccola parte... ...potrebbe avere buone intenzioni.

translation.en: Why do you wanna do this with me, anyway?
Because there are places that need to be seen.
translation.it: Perché ci sono posti che devono essere visti.

translation.en: Maybe even the smallest of places can mean something.
translation.it: Anche il più piccolo dei posti potrebbe avere un significato.

translation.en: maybe they can mean something to us.
Maybe they can mean something to you and me.
translation.it: Forse potrebbe avere un significato per me e per te.
Cristo, e dicono che sono io l'antisociale.

translation.en: We can do more if you end up loving it.
translation.it: O anche di più, se ti piacerà.

translation.en: Oh, I found another quote for you.
translation.it: Ho trovato un'altra citazione per te.

translation.en: "I feel a thousand capacities spring up in me."
translation.it: "Sento migliaia di capacità spuntare dentro di me."

translation.en: The Waves. It's from The Waves.
You've got at least a thousand capacities in you.
translation.it: Hai almeno mille capacità dentro di te.

translation.en: Even if you don't think so.
You know people call you "The Freak," right?
translation.it: Sai che ti chiamano "Lo schizzato", vero?

translation.en: Sometimes I say and do things without thinking, and...
translation.it: A volte dico e faccio cose senza pensare

translation.en: people don't like that, people like labels.
translation.it: e alle persone non piace. A loro piacciono le etichette.

translation.en: They like putting you in a box. They want you to be who they want you to be.
translation.it: Metterti in una scatola. Che tu sia chi vogliono che tu sia.
A loro non piace il caos.

translation.en: My parents are calling Hudson to get me outta the project,
translation.it: I miei mi faranno dare un altro progetto.

translation.en: so you need to find another partner.
He feels pretty strongly about participation.
If you wanna do this with me,
you have to figure out another way because I'm not getting in a car.
translation.it: devi trovare un altro modo, perché non salgo in auto.

translation.en: [Finch] Can I ask you a question?
Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
-[Violet] California. -[Finch] But you've already been there.
translation.it: In California. Ma la conosci già.

translation.en: It's warm and it never snows.
translation.it: Fa caldo e non nevica mai.

translation.en: [Finch] Don't you wanna know where I'd go if I could go anywhere?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere dove andrei io, potendo scegliere?

translation.en: [Violet] Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
[Finch] I'd go to a place no one's ever been before.
translation.it: Andrei in un posto dove nessuno è stato prima.

translation.en: You could come... if you want.
Come on. The view is incredible.
I think if I were here for literally any other reason than why you and I are here,
translation.it: Credo che, se fossi qui per un qualsiasi altro motivo,

translation.en: Oh, wow. Is that a sense of humor you're hiding in there?
translation.it: Vedo che nascondi del senso dell'umorismo.

translation.en: This is the lamest thing I think I've ever seen.
translation.it: È la cosa più patetica che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: It's OK, you know? You're not going to hell for laughing.
translation.it: Puoi farlo, sai? Non andrai all'inferno se ridi.
Era il compleanno di mia sorella.

translation.en: That's why I was at the bridge.
These are the things we leave behind.
translation.it: Queste sono le cose che ci lasciamo alle spalle.

translation.en: This is a motherfucking staring contest.
translation.it: Stiamo facendo una gara di sguardi.

translation.en: Look at my face. I'm really serious.
I'm staying over at Tina's tonight.
-about how Tina's an asshole... -"Diatribe." Good word.
translation.it: - su quanto sia stronza... - Bella parola.

translation.en: ...and how I shouldn't spend so much time with her.
Yeah, well, it appears that my many rantings on this topic
translation.it: Sembra che ti ricordi la mia opinione sull'argomento,

translation.en: have stuck with you, and I don't have to preach anymore.
translation.it: quindi la smetto di farti la predica.

translation.en: [Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.it: "Non possiamo affrontare un altro di quei terribili momenti."

translation.en: [Violet] "Why are women so much more interesting to men than men are to women?"
translation.it: "Perché gli uomini rincorrono le donne più delle donne gli uomini?"

translation.en: [Finch] "My own brain is, to me, the most unaccountable of machinery,
translation.it: "Il mio cervello è, per me, il più inspiegabile dei marchingegni:

translation.en: always buzzing, humming, soaring, roaring, diving,
translation.it: ronza, mugugna, si libra, ruggisce, si tuffa

translation.en: [Violet] "If you do not tell the truth about yourself,
translation.it: "Se non capisci la verità su di te,

translation.en: you cannot tell it about other people."
translation.it: non puoi capire quella degli altri."

translation.en: She only liked this Italian poet,
translation.it: Le piaceva solo un poeta italiano,

translation.en: He said, "We do not remember days, we remember moments."
translation.it: Lui aveva scritto: "Non ricordiamo i giorni, ricordiamo i momenti".

translation.en: Any time I was having a bad day,
translation.it: E se avevo una giornata storta,

translation.en: Like it was supposed to fix something.
translation.it: Come se ciò dovesse sistemare le cose.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna have to steal that one from you.
-[Dad] Yeah. Well, give it a-- -[Violet] Almost ready.
-[pan sizzling] -[Violet] There we go. That one's good. -[Dad] Yeah, there you go. Golden brown -[Violet laughs]
translation.it: - Ecco, questo è pronto. - Sì, bello dorato.

translation.en: You're not mad that I'm doing that project with Roamer, right?
translation.it: Mi eviti perché faccio il progetto con Roamer?

translation.en: No. OK, cool. 'Cause it's, like, it's not a thing.
No, it's fine. I'm doing it with Finch.
translation.it: Lo so, io lo faccio con Finch.

translation.en: You know that he's, like, kinda dangerous?
He freaked out last year and threw a chair at Roamer, like, in the middle of class.
translation.it: Ha dato di matto l'anno scorso e ha lanciato una sedia a Roamer.

translation.en: [Amanda] Yeah, like, Roamer was fine, but he's seriously fucked up.
translation.it: Roamer non si è fatto niente, ma... ...è davvero fuori di testa.

translation.en: So, I was thinking we should check out the Shoe Tree or the abandoned drive-in,
translation.it: Potremmo andare all'albero delle scarpe o al drive-in abbandonato,
scegli tu cosa ti va di fare.

translation.en: That's a reminder that sooner or later,
translation.it: È un promemoria che, prima o poi,

translation.en: you're gonna have to get back into the world all by yourself.
translation.it: dovrai tornare al mondo da sola.

translation.en: But I'm happy pushing you for now.
translation.it: Ma per ora sono felice di spingerti.

translation.en: Well, I said I was only gonna do two, so...
translation.it: Ho detto che ne avrei fatte solo due...

translation.en: I prefer Private Violet to... Public Violet.
translation.it: Preferisco la Violet del privato a quella del pubblico.

translation.en: I'll wait. [boy] Maybe you should give her some space.
translation.it: - Rimango in linea. - Dovresti darle spazio.

translation.en: Nice sweater. What's that, a cotton blend?
translation.it: Bel maglione. Cos'è, un misto cotone?

translation.en: People think this whole "freak" thing is an act. I know it's real.
translation.it: Tu non fingi di essere schizzato. Io so che lo sei.

translation.en: Come on. You gotta give me more than that.
People are always telling me what I am.
translation.it: La gente mi dice sempre ciò che sono.

translation.en: Doesn't mean it doesn't piss me off sometimes.
translation.it: Ma mi fa comunque incazzare, a volte.

translation.en: [Mr. Embry] Well, that must be hard.
Come on. Help me out here. Come on. Help me out.
you could put it right over there.
It would really give me the mise en scène that I was looking for.
translation.it: Così potrei fare la sceneggiata che ho in mente.

translation.en: Did you look into that support group I told you to check out?
translation.it: Hai letto le info sul gruppo di supporto?

translation.en: I might've lost the info on that one.
translation.it: Mi sa che le ho perse.

translation.en: Come on, Theodore. It's a small ask, man.
[sighs] All right. It's Mondays after school at First Congregational.
translation.it: Lo fanno di lunedì, dopo la scuola, alla Chiesa Congregazionale.

translation.en: so you can say whatever you want about anything that's bothering you.
translation.it: puoi dire tutto quello che vuoi su qualsiasi cosa ti perseguiti.

translation.en: It is a safe space, Finch.
I want you to think about it.
What now? Now what are we doing? What?

translation.it: - Non è originale. - Via, per favore.

translation.en: There's a kid on my lawn.
translation.it: C'è un ragazzo sul mio prato.

translation.en: I know you said that you were done,
translation.it: So che hai detto di avere chiuso,

translation.en: but what if I told you
that I found the best wander in the state of Indiana,
translation.it: che ho trovato la migliore meraviglia dell'Indiana,

translation.en: I'd say have fun, and I can't wait to hear all about it.
translation.it: Ti direi di raccontarmi tutto quando torni.

translation.en: Come on! Just give it a chance.
I'm not getting in a car!
Look, here. I'll take the keys, and...
I swear not to drive faster than 30 miles per hour through town
translation.it: Giuro che non supererò i 50 km/h in città

translation.en: If at any time you wanna stop, we stop.
translation.it: Ci fermeremo ogni volta che vorrai.

translation.en: You don't listen. We did it. The project is over. This is over.
translation.it: Non ascolti. Il progetto è finito, tutto questo è finito.

translation.en: You know this isn't about a class assignment.
translation.it: Sai che non riguarda il compito.

translation.en: This is about you being holed up in your room or on your stupid bike,
translation.it: Riguarda te rinchiusa in camera o su una stupida bici,

translation.en: always circling the same three-mile radius.
And God forbid anyone risk upsetting "Poor Violet," but...
translation.it: E nessuno vuole turbare la povera Violet, ma...

translation.en: Sorry. Hey. Hi, I'm Theodore Finch. Pleasure to meet you both.
translation.it: Scusate, sono Theodore Finch. È un piacere.

translation.en: -Little early, don't you think, Theodore? -Yes. Yes, it is early.
translation.it: È un po' presto, non credi? Sì, è vero.

translation.en: But you see, I'm your daughter's partner for the school project,
translation.it: Ma, sa, sto lavorando a un progetto con Violet

translation.en: and we really need to get to this place.
translation.it: e dobbiamo andare in un posto.

translation.en: Basically, I need her to get into the car.
with an experienced driver who hasn't gotten so much as a speeding ticket.
translation.it: e guidata da un autista cauto e con esperienza.

translation.en: This is for a school project?
Well, Theodore, I think it's Violet's decision to make, but...
translation.it: Beh, Theodore, la decisione spetta a Violet, ma...

translation.en: Hey, your guess is as good as ours.
OK. If I were keys, where would I hide?
translation.it: Se io fossi le chiavi, dove mi nasconderei?

translation.en: How are we doin' over there?
Just stop asking me. You're making it worse.
translation.it: Smettila di chiedermelo, peggiori le cose.
Quello è il mio forte, di solito.

translation.en: But right now, I got nothin'.
translation.it: Ma ora non mi viene in mente niente.

translation.en: I don't remember how fast we were going.
and Eleanor was saying, "I can't hold on."
And then the car slammed into the bridge.
translation.it: E poi l'auto si è schiantata contro il ponte.

translation.en: I just remember the... the glass hitting my face
translation.it: Ricordo solo il vetro che mi colpiva in faccia

translation.en: Then... after that, it just all goes blank.
translation.it: E poi, tutto è diventato nero.

translation.en: When I woke up in the hospital,
my mom told me she was gone.
translation.it: mamma mi ha detto che era morta.

translation.en: Still mad you got in the car?
-[Finch] You really built this yourself? -Yes, I did.
translation.it: - Davvero ha fatto tutto da solo? - Sì.

translation.en: -[man] All right. Here we go. -[Finch] Let's do it.
translation.it: IL FLASH BLU - Siamo pronti. - Andiamo.

translation.en: I can see my house from here.
-Oh, yeah. It's just like the real thing. -[Violet laughs]
translation.it: Oh, sì. Sembra uno di quelli veri.

translation.en: All right. Here we go. You ready?
I got you somethin'. It's in the door.
translation.it: Ti ho preso una cosa. Nella portiera.

translation.en: That, Ultraviolet, is a special place
translation.it: Quello, Ultraviolet, è un posto speciale

translation.en: that I'm gonna take you to one day.
translation.it: in cui ti porterò un giorno.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're gonna need to start pullin' your weight, OK?
translation.it: Sì, ma devi iniziare a fare la tua parte.

translation.en: just in case you've forgotten this is a school project,
translation.it: SCRIVIMI Nel caso avessi dimenticato che è un progetto

translation.en: you have to write about it.
No. You gotta start with Hoosier Hill.
You know, you don't have to be so pushy.
You say "pushy," and I hear, um... "assertive," "bold," "inspiring."
translation.it: Tu dici "insistente" e io sento risoluto, audace e stimolante.

translation.en: It's nice to have a friend again.
translation.it: È bello avere di nuovo un amico.

translation.en: Don't let that go to your head.
You know what I like about you, Ultraviolet?
translation.it: Sai cosa mi piace di te, Ultraviolet?

translation.en: [Finch] You're all the colors in one... at full brightness.
translation.it: Sei tutti i colori in uno, alla massima luminosità.

translation.en: Before we get started, we are nearing D-Day, people.
translation.it: Prima di iniziare, voglio ricordarvi che ci siamo quasi.

translation.en: The day to present your wanderings. That is correct.
translation.it: Fra poco dovrete presentare i vostri lavori. Esatto.

translation.en: I'm going to be asking each group to do a presentation to the whole class.
translation.it: voglio che ogni gruppo faccia una presentazione alla classe.

translation.en: But today, we're talking about the five themes of geography:
translation.it: Ma oggi parliamo dei cinque temi della geografia.

translation.en: No, but honestly, I wouldn't even worry about it.
translation.it: No, ma onestamente io non mi preoccuperei.

translation.en: -This is just what Finch does. -[girl] Yeah.
I've texted him for the past couple days, and he hasn't responded.
translation.it: Sono due giorni che gli scrivo e non mi risponde.

translation.en: ...I mean, sometimes he's gone for a day, like, maybe two, but he always turns up.
translation.it: A volte, scompare per un giorno, anche due, ma poi ricompare sempre.

translation.en: [boy] Yeah, there was that one time that he was gone for like a week.
translation.it: Una volta, è scomparso per un'intera settimana.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -He came back and said he went camping,
and he had all these poison ivy spots on him... -Covered in spots. -...itching, it was like... yeah.
translation.it: Aveva tutte irritazioni da edera velenosa, ovunque.

translation.en: It was bad. It was so bad. [chuckling]
I think it's pretty fucked up.
It's easy to pick up your phone and respond.
It's... that's just something you have to deal with
translation.it: È... Ti ci devi abituare, se vuoi stargli vicino.

translation.en: if you wanna be close with him, you know?
translation.it: Ti ci devi abituare, se vuoi stargli vicino.

translation.en: Yeah. So, we've been to a lot of really interesting places so far.
translation.it: Siamo stati in posti molto interessanti.

translation.en: [Violet's dad] Do you have an actual plan,
or you've just kind of been shooting from the hip?
Honestly? I'm just trying to distract her into spending as much time with me
translation.it: Sinceramente? Cerco solo di distrarla per farle passare

translation.en: [Violet's dad] And has it been going OK, or--
Yeah, I think so. I've been really...
Did you lose your phone? I've been texting. I've been calling.
translation.it: Hai perso il telefono? Perché non rispondevi?

translation.en: Look, let me just show you this really fast. Hold on.
-You could've taken a second to respond... -I know.
translation.it: - Potevi prenderti un secondo... - Lo so.

translation.en: -...so I knew you were OK. -I had to take care of a couple things.
In the '50s, a group of boys went swimming here,
translation.it: Negli anni '50, dei ragazzi si sono tuffati

translation.en: No one ever found their bodies.
Or maybe they found the other side.
translation.it: O forse hanno trovato l'altro lato.

translation.en: They say there's a force in the middle that sucks you into an underground river
translation.it: Pare che al centro una forza ti risucchi in un fiume sotterraneo

translation.en: and leads you to another world.
translation.it: e ti porti in un altro mondo.

translation.en: -No, I'm good. -What are you afraid of?
translation.it: - No, grazie. - Di cosa hai paura?

translation.en: what are you most afraid of?
-Oh, you're right. Fucking freezing! -[Violet] Oh, my God!
translation.it: - Avevi ragione. Si gela, cazzo! - Oddio!

translation.en: So, what are you most afraid of?
translation.it: Tu di cosa hai più paura?

translation.en: I don't know. I guess losing my sister.
translation.it: Non so. Forse di perdere mia sorella.

translation.en: My dad left a while ago. New town, new family.
translation.it: Mio padre se n'è andato. Nuova città, nuova famiglia.

translation.en: So, Kate's basically all I have.
translation.it: Quindi... Kate è tutto ciò che ho.

translation.en: I'm going in search of the bottom.
[gasps] Do you know how scared I was?
I didn't... I didn't mean to scare you.
That was the last thing that I wanted to do.
translation.it: Era l'ultima cosa che volevo fare.

translation.en: Where do you go when you disappear?
Tell me something real about you.
translation.it: Dimmi qualcosa di vero su di te.

translation.en: Sometimes I have to go to places that make me feel like myself.
translation.it: A volte, devo andare in posti dove posso sentirmi me stesso.

translation.en: I need to do things that remind me that I'm in control.
translation.it: Devo fare cose che mi ricordino che ho il controllo.

translation.en: Did he do that to you?
I used to be a lot smaller.
I used to not know how to get out of the way.
translation.it: Non sapevo come togliermi di mezzo.

translation.en: -Oh, wait. Yeah, you got it. -I know, I had it!
translation.it: - Aspetta. Sì, così. - Me la ricordo.

translation.en: [both singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.it: Ti ho incontrata in piedi sul parapetto

translation.en: ♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.it: Cosa ti frulla dentro quel bel cranietto?

translation.en: ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.it: Ti ho incontrata in piedi sul parapetto

translation.en: ♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.it: Piuttosto vieni a parlare con me Ti aspetto

translation.en: -[Violet giggles] And then it goes-- -There's the bridge.
translation.it: - E poi fa... - C'è il bridge...

translation.en: ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.it: Ti ho incontrata in piedi sul parapetto

translation.en: Finch, wake up. We gotta go.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. My phone died.
translation.it: Scusate, mi si è spento il telefono.

translation.en: -Finch, just... you should go home. -[Finch] Don't blame her.
-If I could explain. Please-- -It's not his fault!
translation.it: - Non è colpa sua. - Non è colpa sua! - Per favore... - Dentro.

translation.en: -We'll talk about it later. -I lost track of time.
translation.it: - Ne riparliamo. - Non ci siamo resi conto.

translation.en: It was my fault. I fucked up.
translation.it: È colpa mia. Ho fatto un casino.

translation.en: Please, just don't blame her. Please. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Per favore, non date la colpa a lei. Vi prego. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: what horrible situations we had you in, in our heads?
You have to understand how that felt,
translation.it: Devi capire come ci siamo sentiti,

translation.en: your dad and I not knowing where you were.
But you didn't have to treat Finch like that.
translation.it: Ma siete stati ingiusti con Finch.

translation.en: Well, he's the boy that kept our daughter out all night.
translation.it: Lui ha tenuto nostra figlia fuori tutta la notte.

translation.en: I kept him out all night, too, Mom.
translation.it: E io ho tenuto fuori lui, mamma.

translation.en: -Fine. -It's been a minute. What's been going on?
translation.it: - Bene. - Non parliamo da un po'.

translation.en: I can't deal with you right now.
I'm not tryin' to be an asshole, but you should know what you're getting into.
translation.it: Non per fare lo stronzo, ma non sai in cosa ti stai cacciando.

translation.en: -Where've you been? -You know why she's hangin' out with you?
translation.it: - Dov'eri? - Sai perché esce con te?

translation.en: She's tryin' to fix you. Shut up, Roamer! Just...
translation.it: - Sta cercando di aggiustarti. - Zitto, Roamer!

translation.en: [Roamer] You have no idea who he really is, do you? He's a freak!
translation.it: Non hai idea di chi sia davvero. È uno schizzato!

translation.en: -Call me a freak one more time. -You're a fuckin' freak.
Finch! Yo, let him go, man. Get off him.
[girl 2] What the hell? He almost killed him.
translation.it: Ma che cavoli? L'ha quasi ucciso.

translation.en: I've been friends with the guy since minute one,
translation.it: Sono suo amico da una vita

translation.en: and I haven't waited for his call in years.
translation.it: e non ha senso aspettare che chiami.

translation.en: gets in this mood sometimes, and...
and everybody who gets close to him gets burned out.
translation.it: e chi gli si avvicina, rimane scottato.

translation.en: So, why do you stick around?
He thinks everybody leaves him and I won't do that.
translation.it: Pensa che tutti lo abbandonino e io non voglio farlo.

translation.en: I'm gonna get mad, he's gonna come back and apologize, and it'll be like it never even happened.
translation.it: io mi arrabbio, lui torna, si scusa ed è come se non fosse mai successo.

translation.en: Um... I'm OCD and just got diagnosed with a social anxiety disorder,
translation.it: Ho il DOC e il disturbo da ansia sociale,

translation.en: so being here with everyone is not intimidating at all.
translation.it: quindi stare qui non è affatto intimidatorio.

translation.en: Last year, I started cutting myself.
translation.it: L'anno scorso ho iniziato a tagliarmi.

translation.en: I still deal with it, but I'm here.
translation.it: Ancora lo faccio, ma sono qui.

translation.en: Um... I am ADHD, OCD, BPD, DID, and bipolar.
translation.it: Ho il DOC, l'ADHD, il DDI, i disturbi borderline e sono bipolare.

translation.en: Um... you'd think some of those would cancel the others out, but...
translation.it: Verrebbe da pensare che si annullino a vicenda, ma...

translation.en: I've been watching a lot of basketball lately,
and that's been helping a lot, so...
Not really sure why I'm here. [chuckles lightly]
translation.it: Non so bene perché sono qui.

translation.en: I guess it's 'cause I... I got in this fight at school and,
translation.it: Immagino sia perché ho fatto a botte a scuola e...

translation.en: I was there, but I wasn't there.
I-I-I just get a little lost sometimes.
I don't know. Is that enough?
Amanda, why don't you go ahead?
I've tried to kill myself twice.
translation.it: Ho tentato il suicidio due volte.

translation.en: I think about it almost every day.
[Kate] Hey, have you heard anything yet?
I gotta go to work. I'm gonna be late. But you should stay.
translation.it: Io vado al lavoro o faccio tardi. Tu resta pure.

translation.en: Why does he keep doing this?
Have him call me when you hear from him, OK?
translation.it: Digli di chiamarmi quando lo senti.

translation.en: [Amanda] I heard you beat the shit outta Roamer.
Why do you keep doing stuff like that? Aren't you tired of people talking about you all the time?
translation.it: Perché fai così? Non sei stanco di far parlare di te?

translation.en: I don't know. I feel like I keep messing things up,
translation.it: Non lo so. Mi sembra di continuare a rovinare le cose

translation.en: and I'm not sure I know how to not do that.
translation.it: e non so bene... ...come smettere di farlo.

translation.en: [Kate] Your girlfriend's pretty worried about you.
She's been at the house all afternoon.
translation.it: È stata da noi tutto il pomeriggio.

translation.en: good memories you have of him?
Well, the fact that he would beat the shit out of us
translation.it: Beh, il fatto che ci picchiasse a sangue

translation.en: kind of negated all the good times.
But why was he like that?
Was he like that because of us? Was he...
translation.it: Era così per colpa nostra? Era...

translation.en: He was like that because he was a shitty person.
translation.it: Era così perché era una persona di merda.

translation.en: [Finch] There has to be a reason, though.
Because if there's a reason, then he could get better. Something or...
translation.it: Perché se ci fosse un motivo, potrebbe guarire. Qualcosa o...

translation.en: someone could make him better, right?
I don't know. Who cares? Dude, he's someone else's problem.
translation.it: Non so, a chi importa? Non è un nostro problema.

translation.en: Why are you asking me about Dad?
Come on. You can talk to me, man.
Are you sure? Because I have to open the bar,
translation.it: Sicuro? Perché devo aprire il bar,

translation.en: -but I can find someone to cover me. -I'm good. [chuckles]
translation.it: - ma posso farmi sostituire. - Sto bene.

translation.en: You know I love you, right, Theo?
translation.it: Sai che ti voglio bene, vero?

translation.en: I don't understand what that means.
I... get into these dark moods.
I think too fast to keep track of anything,
translation.it: Penso troppo in fretta, mi perdo nei pensieri

translation.en: all my thoughts are gone at once.
And sometimes, if I put 'em up there, I can...
translation.it: E a volte, se li scrivo lì, posso...

translation.en: I can't right now. I can't.
I can fix it. I just... I just need time to figure this out.
translation.it: Posso sistemare tutto. Ho solo bisogno di tempo per capire come.

translation.en: -[Violet] I'm trying to help you. -I don't need your help!
translation.it: - Sto cercando di aiutarti. - Non mi serve il tuo aiuto!

translation.en: This is on me! This isn't about you!
translation.it: Devo farlo io! Non riguarda te!

translation.en: You need to tell me what's wrong.
translation.it: Devi dirmi cosa c'è che non va.

translation.en: [voicemail] Hey, it's Finch. Leave a message.
I'm just sorry that I pushed.
just need you to come back.
translation.it: Ho bisogno che torni da me.

translation.en: I just really need you to come back, OK?
translation.it: Ho davvero bisogno che torni, capito?

translation.en: I found myself at the bridge.
I was standing on a ledge.

translation.it: È così che ho conosciuto Finch.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad Finch was there.
translation.it: Sono felice che Finch fosse lì.

translation.en: [Violet] I just wish I knew where he was.
you two have been a lot of places.
translation.it: Voi due siete stati in tanti posti.

translation.en: Is there any place else he might go?

translation.it: A nome della famiglia di Finch,

translation.en: I wanna thank you all for being here today.
translation.it: voglio ringraziarvi per essere qui oggi.

translation.en: We've gathered to celebrate and to honor the memory of one
translation.it: Siamo qui riuniti per commemorare e rendere omaggio alla memoria

translation.en: who will be incredibly missed because he has been so dearly loved.
translation.it: di un ragazzo di cui molte persone sentiranno la mancanza.

translation.en: The events of these past few days...
Sorry that I wasn't there for you.
translation.it: Scusa se non ti sono stata vicina.

translation.en: I didn't know how to tell you.
for the weary travelers to stop and rest along their way.
translation.it: per permettere ai viaggiatori stanchi di riposarsi sulla via.

translation.en: It was built in memoriam to those
who have lost their lives in auto accidents...
translation.it: che hanno perso la vita in incidenti d'auto.

translation.en: and as a place for healing.
We remember those who are no longer here,
translation.it: Ricordiamo coloro che non ci sono più,

translation.en: who were taken from us too soon,
translation.it: che ci sono stati portati via troppo presto

translation.en: and who we will always keep in our hearts."
translation.it: e rimarranno sempre nei nostri cuori."

translation.en: [Violet] I used to be worried about everything.
I worried about what would happen if I let myself feel again.
translation.it: Di cosa sarebbe successo se avessi provato di nuovo qualcosa.

translation.en: I thought I didn't deserve to.
I wasn't worried about what would happen if I lived.
translation.it: Non temevo più ciò che sarebbe successo se fossi vissuta.

translation.en: I was worried about what would happen if I didn't.
Not remembering all of the moments...
Because he taught me to wander.
translation.it: Lui mi ha insegnato a esplorare.

translation.en: [Violet] He taught me that you don't have to climb a mountain
translation.it: Mi ha insegnato che non bisogna scalare una montagna

translation.en: to stand on top of the world.
translation.it: per stare in cima al mondo.

translation.en: That even the ugliest of places can be beautiful,
translation.it: Che anche i posti più brutti possono essere belli

translation.en: as long as you take the time to look.
translation.it: se ti prendi un momento per guardarli.

translation.en: That it's OK to get lost...
as long as you find your way back.
translation.it: Basta trovare la strada del ritorno.

translation.en: But in learning all of that,
I missed seeing something more important...
translation.it: non ho visto la cosa più importante.

translation.en: I missed that he was in pain.
translation.it: TOCCA A TE Il suo dolore.

translation.en: I missed that he was teaching me all along
translation.it: Non ho visto che, in realtà, mi stava insegnando

translation.en: He dreamt while he was awake.
He dreamt of all the beauty in the world, and he made it come to life.
translation.it: Sognava tutta la bellezza del mondo e le faceva prendere vita.

translation.en: Finch taught me that there's beauty in the most unexpected of places.
translation.it: Finch mi ha insegnato che c'è bellezza dove meno te l'aspetti.

translation.en: And that there are bright places,
you can be that bright place...
